text: Christopher Scott "Chris" Kyle (April 8, 1974 â€“ February 2, 2013) was a United States Navy SEAL. Kyle was the most lethal sniper in U.S. military history. He had 160 confirmed kills out of 255 possible kills. Kyle was born in Odessa, Texas. On February 2, 2013, Kyle was shot and killed at a shooting range near Chalk Mountain, Texas, aged 38. title: Chris Kyle
